descriptionHtml:
The Dragon Soul Gem.

Please Rate this, as I was willing to share this mod.

You absorb 1 Dragon Soul by eating the Dragon Soul Gem.

Craftable at the Cooking Pot with the Required Ingredients.
3x Filled Black Soul Gems
3x Gold Ore
3x Dragon Bones
3x Dragon Scales

Q: Why does the Gem look like that? 
A: To match the effect when you absorb a soul from killing a Dragon.

Q: Why 3x all items? 
A: Because that\'s how I made it!

Q: Can I also absorb it Anally?
A: Whatever floats your boat!

You can not Modify & Upload my files!
author: MontyX
